--- In gladiator@y..., "dancing corpse" <dancing_corpse@h...> wrote:
> yah slimes would defanitly be banned (50 greenish in color archmages 
popping 
> around the screen creating elimentals...). also claric-mage and 
> cleric-archmage should be banned.

Sorry, I disagree with that point.  The whole point of halfings is 
creating stronger characters.  If you really want to get technical, 
banning half clerics is more effective.  It is way too easy for 
clerics to accumulate experience (using 'heal') and and any other 
character equipped with that ability, would have no trouble gaining 
lots of experience really quick.

> don't you think 20's too steep? people will never use there 
charecters

What would you propose?  experience level 15?  The idea is you've 
reached a point where you've maxed out on using both character's 
abilities individually and you want to progress.  One character [I 
forgot which one] requires you to reach experience level 12 before you 
get access to all  abilites.  I want some point a few steps further 
than that before allowing the creation of halfings.  By requiring a 
higher experience level for halfings, it should make some people think 
twice before creating a halfing.
